ThingDef.label: food shelf 2x2
ThingDef.description:
A 2x2 shelf for storing perishable items. 8 layer shelf. Allowing up to 4x items per gound square. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. 

This storage area is set to Important and has by default all the items that spoil from vanilla and the garden mods. 

Things to store here: Foods, Drugs, Medicines, Plant Matters, and Animals Corpses.

ThingDef.label: hydro-jelly farm
ThingDef.description: A hive grown from hive pieces, collected from pieces of hives found in caves or bought from traders. Will produce insect jelly and glow pods after a time. Falls aparts after a few days, needing more resources to rebuild.

ThingDef.label: simple fish trap
ThingDef.description: A simple fish trap made of wood and metal that will produce fish in a few days. Some of the materials used to create the trap are lost, after some fish are caught. The trap will then need to be rebuilt.

ThingDef.label: bamboo campfire
ThingDef.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.

ThingDef.label: bamboo torch lamp
ThingDef.description: A bamboo torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.

ThingDef.label: Soylent Machine
ThingDef.description: A machine to produce Soylent from Plants, Animal Products, Meat and "High Energy Plankton"(R).

ThingDef.label: heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: small heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: mini heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceilng mounted sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: small ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An small ceiling mounted sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: mini ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An very small ceiling mounted sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: AO ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceilng mounted lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: AO small ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A small ceilng mounted lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: AO mini ceiling sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An very small ceilng mounted lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: heated ceilng sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceilng mounted lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: small ceilng heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A small ceilng mounted sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: mini ceilng heated sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A mini ceilng mounted sun lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Also is a large heater that will keep your room warm.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp column
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night. Hold up the roof.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp column AO
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Does not turn itself off at night. Hold up the roof.

ThingDef.label: heated sun lamp column
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night. Hold up the roof.

ThingDef.label: Planter Box
ThingDef.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. fertility is reduced to 70%. Does not require power.

ThingDef.label: Modular Planter Box
ThingDef.description: Crude box filled with soil, that allows you to grow anywhere. fertility is reduced to 70%. Does not require power. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.

ThingDef.label: ADV Modular Planter Box
ThingDef.description: Upgraded planter box filled with soil and fertilizer, that allows you to grow anywhere. Fertility is 120%. Does not require power. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size. But is not movable.

ThingDef.label: Modular Flower Box
ThingDef.description: Flower box filled with soil. Modular allows you to make 1x1 connected boxes of any size.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut. fertility is 280%.

ThingDef.label: Modular Hydroponics Basin
ThingDef.description: Grows plants quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires power to work; plants will die if power is cut. fertility is 280%.

ThingDef.label: Advanced hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. fertility is 310%.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Modular hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: Grows plants more quickly in an artificial nutrient bath. Requires more power to work then basic basin; plants will die if power is cut. Provides it's own light. fertility is 310%.

ThingDef.label: Old Composter Box
ThingDef.description: Please de-construct this. Will return some wood and fertilizer.

ThingDef.label: AO sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: AO small sun lamp
ThingDef.description: A small lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: AO mini sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An very small lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Stays on at night.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: small sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An small lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: mini sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An very small lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a large amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: digging spot
ThingDef.description: Place on diggable non rocky soil tiles to digging up piles of soil.

ThingDef.label: oven
ThingDef.description: A stone oven used for baking.

ThingDef.label: electric oven
ThingDef.description: A electric oven used for baking.

ThingDef.label: Fueled Food prep table
ThingDef.description: An un-powered version of the canning stove, food press, and prep table. Makes simple items. Requires 40% work to make items here.

ThingDef.label: Food prep table
ThingDef.description: An electric canning stove, food press, and prep table.

ThingDef.label: Fueled Sweets Table
ThingDef.description: Makes sweet treats.

ThingDef.label: Sweets Table
ThingDef.description: Makes sweet treats.

ThingDef.label: Cooking tools
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed 14%. Needs to be placed near cooking tops. Will boost the cook speed of all tables near by.

ThingDef.label: Milling Stone
ThingDef.description: A small muscle-powered grinding stone for grinding raw plants.

ThingDef.label: Electric Milling Stone
ThingDef.description: A small electric-powered grinding stone for quickly grinding raw plants. Faster then the Grindstone. Larger capacity.

ThingDef.label: compacted salt
ThingDef.description: Salt compacted over time..

ThingDef.label: salt mine
ThingDef.description: Place on rough stone for digging up salt.

ThingDef.label: tailor's loom
ThingDef.description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.

ThingDef.label: electric loom
ThingDef.description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.
